name: Soulscape
description:
• Explore the Dangerous and Bizarre World of Dragonar.
  • Fight Epic battles against Bizarre and Eldritch monstrosities.
  • Upgrade and build your character in whatever way you like!
  • Tame magical dragons to summon in battle!
  • Fight Dozens of unique and powerful bosses.
  • Ride around on your sick wheelchair.
  • Look at sentient Ass-cheeks in a club.
  • Experience the First Chapter in an epic trilogy!

Soulscape is a strange world, waiting to be conquered! Will you rise to the challenge?
